title: From The Berlin Wall To A Space Bubble, Stories That Reverberate Online
teaser: Mashable's viral content editor joins us to take a look at stories gaining traction online, including a video involving a GoPro in space.
contentencoded:
Annie Colbert, viral content editor of Mashable, joins Here & Now’s Robin Young to take a look at stories that are gaining traction online, from the celebration of the 25th anniversary of the fall of the Berlin Wall, to a video involving a GoPro camera that astronauts on the International Space Station put inside a zero-gravity water bubble.

Stories Discussed In This Segment:
  • Washington Post: Redefining The N-Word
  • New York Times: Our ‘Mommy’ Problem
  • Mashable: Doritos-flavored Mountain Dew is a thing that apparently exists

[Youtube]

Guest

  • Annie Colbert, viral content editor at the news and social media website Mashable. She tweets @anniecolbert.
